channel.title: Cutefish on Reion's Think
channel.description: Recent content in Cutefish on Reion's Think

item.title: A Notification Design Idea
item.description: I recently saw a new design for the front screen of the iPhone 14 pro series, whice they call “Dynamic island”, and there’s where I got my inspiration.

item.title: Cutefish Menu Bar Chameleon
item.description: A new feature introduced in the macOS Big Sur version of the top menu bar is that the menu bar background color adapts to the desktop wallpaper for a more integrated effect than before.
